item.description:
A little field trip to the Higgins Armory Museum in Worcester. This museum houses a collection of arms and armor from various eras and continents. More information about the museum can be found at http://www.higgins.or... Admission is $9 for adults and $7 for children.

Carpool will meet at 10:30 at the commuter lot at Exit 67 off from I-84. If you want to meet us directly at the museum, plan to arrive there at noon. The museum is open noon to 4:00 and we may stop for a pizza or something similar on the way home.
item.name: Higgins Armory Museum
